snippet: The data suggested that Vertex could have a multibillion-dollar franchise in treating cystic fibrosis, a life-threatening genetic disorder that affects about 70,000 people worldwide.
abstract: Vertex Pharmaceuticals says preliminary findings shows its combination of a cystic fibrosis drug and an experimental treatment for the disease led to significantly improved breathing ability for patients; data suggests Vertex could have a multibillion-dollar franchise in treating the disease.
lead_paragraph: The data suggested that Vertex could have a multibillion-dollar franchise in treating cystic fibrosis, a life-threatening genetic disorder that affects about 70,000 people worldwide.
